item.title: Studying while working fulltime
item.description: I’ve recently changed employer; I swapped insurance for transport. I went from MS Amlin to Lineas; I now help drive a ‘Freight Force’.

item.title: A day in the life of a remote worker
item.description: Recently, I was asked what my day looks like during this pandemic as it rendered me (like so many others) a full-time remote worker.

item.title: Icinga2 Notifications: 101
item.description: Problem Email notifications in Icinga2 for your hostgroup You can’t find a quick ’n dirty method Pre-Reqs Installation of Icinga2 Configured some hosts, hostgroups and services So how do I do it?

item.title: New job
item.description: On April 1st, I started a new job, or rather I switch roles.
